creator: drew.varner@sc.edu
text:
The patch does the following:

1) Modifies hpsf/book.xml to point to a new file, thumbnail-how-to.xml
2) Adds the new file, thumbnail-how-to.xml

Patch follows and will be attached as a .txt file as well, along with Zip of 
thumbnail-how-to.xml and associated directory structure.

- Drew

Created attachment 1754
Diffs to patch hpsf/book.xml
